newsitem.title: MEXICO: RESEARCH ALERT-Gemex started long term buy.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT-Gemex started long term buy.

text.p: Afin Securities Mexico City analyst Scott Kolb said on Tuesday the brokerage began coverage of Mexican bottler Pepsi-Gemex with a long term buy recommendation.

"In 1996, Gemex emerged from two years of net losses to post four consecutive quarters of improving operating results. We see this trend continuing at least through 1998, both on the gross and operating margin level," Kolb wrote in a report.
